SEARCH
Package com.financial.services.expenses

Class EntityLogicService

java.lang.Object
com.financial.services.expenses.EntityLogicService
public class EntityLogicService extends Object
Utility service that provides stateless logic for grouping, filtering, and aggregating expenses specifically focused on organizational entities and services.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static List<String>
    getAllServiceCodes(ArrayList<? extends BudgetExpense> expenses)
    Returns a distinct and sorted list of all service codes present in the provided expenses.
    static ArrayList<BudgetExpense>
    getExpensesOfServiceWithCode(String serviceCode, ArrayList<? extends BudgetExpense> expenses)
    Filters and returns all expense entries associated with a specific service code.
    static String
    getServiceNameWithCode(String serviceCode, ArrayList<? extends BudgetExpense> expenses)
    Retrieves the descriptive name of a service based on its unique service code from the expense list.
    static Map<String,Long>
    getSumOfEveryExpenseCategory(ArrayList<? extends BudgetExpense> expenses)
    Generates a sorted map linking each unique expense category code to its total financial sum.
    static Map<String,Long>
    getSumOfEveryService(ArrayList<? extends BudgetExpense> expenses)
    Generates a map where each service code is associated with its total financial sum.
    static long
    getSumOfExpenseCategoryWithCode(String code, ArrayList<? extends BudgetExpense> expenses)
    Calculates the total monetary sum for a specific expense category (account code).
    static long
    getSumOfServiceWithCode(String serviceCode, ArrayList<? extends BudgetExpense> expenses)
    Calculates the total monetary sum for a specific service identified by its code.
